verbose_text: In addition, the increase of the amount of E7 mRNA at the expense of the DeltaE7 isoform is more pronounced in ExSpe U1 sm21 stable cells treated with AON 10-27 in comparison to ExSpe U1 sm21 untreated cells (XREF_FIG B, compare stable ExSpe sm21 lanes with stable ExSpe sm21+ AON lanes).
